ygData.subject: Re: Rubicite list (SPOILER)
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, I believe it was Shad who originally posted it, but I will repost it for you as you asked, and for anyone else who wants it! (smile) Of course, all of
ygData.messageBody:
Well, I believe it was Shad who originally posted it, but I will repost it
for you as you asked, and for anyone else who wants it! (smile)

Of course, all of these are in Cazic Thule -

Bracer - Tae Ew Diviner - Throne Room
Leggings - Tae Ew Templar - Throne Room
Helm - Stone Golem - Upstairs Throne Room
Gloves - Steel Golem - Maze
Sleeves - Tae Ew Archon - Pyramid
Boots - Cenobite - Avatar Area
Breastplate - Avatar - Avatar Area

This is all from memory, so it COULD be wrong. I am sure someone will
correct it if it is. (smile!)

Best of luck!

Tallonn


-----Original Message-----
From: Rebecca Small <macha_nabaob@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, July 12, 1999 8:53 AM
Subject: [eqbards] Rubicite list


>From: "Rebecca Small" <macha_nabaob@...>
>
>Hail Good Bards,
>Someone put out a neat list of which Tae dropped which piece of rubicite.
>This topic came up yesterday and even though I thought I had saved that
>note, I can not seem to find it. Can someone send that back to me? I have
>gone for the skald type bard in role play and am now heavily relied upon
for
>information like this. I can't believe I lost it!
>I finally started working up piercing and it's definitely going to take
>awhile to raise it, probably because it is equipped secondary. Just started
>in the courtyard of Cazi, amazing lag and spam there!
>Has anyone noticed the song vendor in HH having been moved? I went to get
>song 23 last night and he was gone. I didn't have time for a full scale
>search.
>
>May you live in interesting times,
>Brilinnia Ban'Sidhe
>L23 on Xegony
>
